item.title: The Shadow as Engine
item.description:
The Shadow as Engine

Summary: The Shadow provides intensity and propulsion; it is not the enemy. The system’s task: give it direction, not suppression.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batch 4

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
